title: My pixel 3 xl is stuck at 77% battery percentage display. It charges and works normally.
content: The battery percentage display is stuck at 77%. The phone works and charges normally. But it doesn't show whats the actual battery percentage. Tried running the battery down and charging to 100%. Tried factory resetting the phone still the battery percentage display shows 77%.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
